00014 inline b3Vector3 localGetSupportVertexWithMargin(const float4& supportVec,const struct b3ConvexPolyhedronData* hull, 
00015         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& verticesA, b3Scalar margin)
00016 {
00017         b3Vector3 supVec = b3MakeVector3(b3Scalar(0.),b3Scalar(0.),b3Scalar(0.));
00018         b3Scalar maxDot = b3Scalar(-B3_LARGE_FLOAT);
00019 
00020     // Here we take advantage of dot(a, b*c) = dot(a*b, c).  Note: This is true mathematically, but not numerically. 
00021     if( 0 < hull->m_numVertices )
00022     {
00023         const b3Vector3 scaled = supportVec;
00024                 int index = (int) scaled.maxDot( &verticesA[hull->m_vertexOffset], hull->m_numVertices, maxDot); 
00025         return verticesA[hull->m_vertexOffset+index];
00026     }
00027 
00028     return supVec;
00029 
00030 }
00031 
00032 inline b3Vector3 localGetSupportVertexWithoutMargin(const float4& supportVec,const struct b3ConvexPolyhedronData* hull, 
00033         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& verticesA)
00034 {
00035         return localGetSupportVertexWithMargin(supportVec,hull,verticesA,0.f);
00036 }

00038 #endif //B3_SUPPORT_MAPPINGS_H
